28 ICE TEA: The tasTEA refreshment!

No time to make your own ice tea?

No worries, 28 Ice Tea tastes like homemade! Made with essences of black, green and white tea, 28 Ice Tea is enriched by high quality ingredients like juice or blossom honey. 28 Ice Tea quenches your thirst and puts a smile on your face.

It can be enjoyed all year long, cold or warm. Discover the range of our tasTEA Ice Teas.

Blueberry White Tea

It feels like summer. The velvet touch of white tea with luscious blueberries.

Lactose-free, no colours, no artificial flavours

Green Tea Honey

A gentle hug right when you need it. The well-being of green tea with a sweet touch of honey.

Lactose-free, no colours, no artificial flavours

Lemon

A twist of lemon to stay sharp and focused black tea with the fruity zest of lemon.

Vegan, lactose-free, no colours, no artificial flavours

Peach

Always time for a peach burst. Black tea with the taste of sunny peaches.

Vegan, lactose-free, no colours, no artificial flavours

Pomegranate

The exotic splash to overcome “Blue Mondays”. Refreshing green tea with succulent pomegranate.

Lactose-free, no colours, no artificial flavours
